section.title: purchase orders list of open List Open Purchase Orders
section.para: The Open Purchase Orders screen displays both unreleased and open (i.e., unvouchered) Purchase Orders. From this screen you may create new or edit existing Purchase Orders. To see the list of unreleased and open Purchase Orders, select the "List Open Purchase Orders" option. The following screen will appear:

note.para: Unreleased Purchase Orders are considered to be a valid source of supply by the planning systems.

section.para: When viewing the list of open Purchase Orders, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify which Purchase Orders you want to display in the list:
Select to include unreleased Purchase Orders in the list.
Select to include open Purchase Orders in the list. Partially-vouchered Purchase Orders will also be displayed, as long as at least one of the Line Items is still open.

section.para: The following buttons are unique to this screen:

listitem.para: Highlight a Purchase Order and then select this button to release the selected Purchase Order.
